title: Rick Rozoff and John Kozy
content:
Rick Rozoff and John Kozy

Rozoff is an activist, anti-war supporter. <!--more--> He’s Stop NATO web site editor.

He documents global militarist trends daily.
He provides vital information on what’s ongoing in Ukraine.

Discussion will focus on Obama’s latest imperial target.
He’s responsible for potentially the most serious post-WW II crisis.

Kozy is a retired philosophy professor.
He now writes on social, political and economic issues.
He taught for many years.
He’s been writing for many more.

Kozy’s latest writing will be discussed.
